title: I can't find my 3x level 7 mastery Hecarim tokens
body: Please help,  i have every other token i got but only hecarim's mastery 7 tokens, they  are hidden, i can't see them.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account to see if I could track down those missing mastery tokens. I did notice Hecarims 2 level 7 Mastery tokens in your hextech inventory.

 You should be able to see them in your Hextech tab, but if they're missing feel free to reach out to us in a [**ticket **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll be able to look further into those mastery tokens!

yes just now they appeared after i got my 3rd S just now, suddenly 3 appeared to me, i think it only appeared after i got straight 3 tokens, but if you did something to make it appear to me then i apprecaite, thanks for the help i am all good now i've updated my hecarim to finally mastery 7

Glad to hear you're all good in the hood!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
